Question & Options:
In the 2004 movie 'Seed of Chucky', which character is inspired by the 1953 cult classic 'Glen or Glenda'?
Options:
A. Glen or Glenda
B. Chucky
C. Tiffany
D. Andy

In the 2004 movie 'Seed of Chucky', what is the relationship between Chucky and the main character?
Options:
A. Chucky is the father of the main character.
B. Chucky is the brother of the main character.
C. Chucky is the friend of the main character.
D. Chucky is the enemy of the main character.
Correct Answer: Chucky is the father of the main character.

Question & Options:
In the movie 'Seed of Chucky' (2004), what was the reason behind Don Mancini's decision to shift the series towards comedy?
Options:
A. To introduce new horror villains
B. To make existing horror villains less scary due to audience familiarity
C. To create a crossover with other horror franchises
D. To focus on character development
Correct Answer: To make existing horror villains less scary due to audience familiarity

Question & Options:
In the 2004 movie 'Seed of Chucky', why did Mancini choose to shoot part of the film in Romania at Castel Studios?
Options:
A. To take advantage of the local talent
B. To save costs
C. To create a more authentic setting
D. To comply with international filming regulations

In the 2004 movie 'Seed of Chucky', how did Mancini attempt to influence the film's aesthetic?
Options:
A. By incorporating modern CGI effects
B. By replicating the look of older horror films
C. By using a documentary style of filming
D. By focusing on a comedic tone
Correct Answer: By replicating the look of older horror films

Question & Options:
In the movie 'Seed of Chucky' (2004), which two filmmakers' styles influenced the production?
Options:
A. Alfred Hitchcock and Martin Scorsese
B. Brian De Palma and Dario Argento
C. Quentin Tarantino and Wes Anderson
D. Tim Burton and David Lynch
Correct Answer: Brian De Palma and Dario Argento

Question & Options:
In the 2004 movie 'Seed of Chucky', which effects designer is credited for the animatronic and makeup effects and also makes a cameo appearance as himself?
Options:
A. Tony Gardner
B. Rick Baker
C. Tom Savini
D. Greg Nicotero
